channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- RubyGems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- RubyGems

item.title: CVE-2017-0902|2024-09-17T00:42:39.081Z -- hackerone -- rubygems
item.description: RubyGems version 2.6.12 and earlier is vulnerable to a DNS hijacking vulnerability that allows a MITM attacker to force the RubyGems client to download and install gems from a server that the attacker controls.
